title: Investigate parakeet-mlx Python library for real progress indicators
description:
Currently using CLI via subprocess with marquee animation. For real progress:

1. Install parakeet-mlx in system Python (not just pipx CLI)
2. Use streaming API: model.transcribe_stream()
3. Show actual transcription progress (tokens/chunks completed)

Reference: https://github.com/senstella/parakeet-mlx

The streaming API provides transcriber.result for real-time progress tracking.
